task.title: Opening ports for desktop client access to the data server
task.shortdesc: If you have an IBM StoredIQ OVA deployed system, you must open the ports for the desktop client to access the data server. On an upgraded system, the correct ports are open.

step.cmd: Log in to the data server as root.

step.stepresult: In the output of the command, check the list position of the rule that is named PROD-reject.

step.cmd: Run the command iptables -A INPUT -j PROD-reject.
Run this command: iptables -D INPUT list_position.
step.info: list_position is the position number of the PROD-reject rule.
